overview:
Brad oversees strategic product and technology development at ZoomSystems. Prior to joining ZoomSystems, he was a senior architect at Siebel Systems (acquired by Oracle) where he redesigned the applications platform. Prior to Siebel, Brad co-founded Angara Database Systems (acquired by Personify) where he designed, coded, and tested the database kernel while serving as a faculty member at Northwestern University.

Brad holds a PhD and MS in Electrical Engineering from Stanford University where he also received his BS in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science.
